item.title: 'Heroic' train worker saved lives, police say, as man, 32, only suspect in stabbing
item.description: The LNER staff member is in a life-threatening condition after trying to stop the attacker.

item.title: At least eight dead after magnitude-6.3 earthquake hits Afghanistan
item.description: The quake struck near Mazar-e Sharif, one of Afghanistan's largest cities, in the early hours of Monday.

item.title: Trump says he doubts US will go to war with Venezuela
item.description: The US president plays down the possibility of war, but does not rule out land strikes.

item.title: Hamas hands over three coffins it says contain bodies of Gaza hostages
item.description: The remains will undergo formal identification in Israel, as the return of deceased hostages under a ceasefire continues.

item.title: Credit scores to include rental payments, says Experian
item.description: The credit agency says the change will give lenders a more complete view of borrower behaviour.
